item.title: Aircraft Monitoring
item.description: Explore Aircraft Monitoring Explore the Skies with ADS-B, UAT, ACARS, and VDL2 Whether you’re an aviation enthusiast, a professional in the industry, or simply curious about the aircraft in our skies, our website and YouTube channel are your gateway to learning how to receive . What is Aircraft Monitoring? Aircraft Monitoring is the practice of tracking and collecting data from aircraft using advanced technologies like ADS-B (Automatic Dependent Surveillanceâ€“Broadcast), UAT (Universal Access Transceiver), ACARS (Aircraft Communications Addressing and Reporting System), and VDL2 (VHF Data Link Mode 2).
